name: Kitty's Venture (itch)
description:
Join the kitty in a challenging fast-paced adventure to hunt for Cat Points. Kitty's Venture is a 2D side-scroller platformer game where you take control of a cute kitty. Play through three different stages with various obscure obstacles, and collect Cat Points. Can you make it to the end?

Kitty's Venture aims to deliver a challenging gameplay experience. Difficulty is one of the main focuses of the game. Expect the unexpected. Each of the stages will challenge player with obscure obstacles. And the only way you can deal with them is by JUMPING. But the player has to be smart, and on point with the timing. 

Features:
- Fast-paced gameplay that requires quick response
- 4 different stages (lot more to come)
- Challenging gameplay requiring patience and precision

Shout-out to Gamedev Kitty for the amazing kitty animations!

Also available on Steam
